FROM alpine:latest 
MAINTAINER MaÃ«l Auzias <docker@mael.auzias.net> 
# python3 
RUN adduser -S python 
RUN apk \--no-cache add python3 

# pip3 
RUN apk \--no-cache add curl \  
ca-certificates \
&& curl -f -O https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py \
&& python3 get-pip.py \
&& rm get-pip.py
# 0bin https://github.com/sametmax/0bin 
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir zerobin \
&& chown python:root -R /usr/lib/python3.5/site-packages/zerobin/
USER python 

ENTRYPOINT [ "zerobin", "--host=0.0.0.0" ]
